reviewText: Espectacula la pelcula Teatro del Crimen con Mara Antonieta Pons. Sylvia Pinal y muchos otros mas artistas famosos de esa poca.

Very good Spanish-language, Mexican-made murder mystery with some touches of comedy.  An unpopular male singer is murdered during the beginning of a theater show.  The police show up and the detectives lock all the doors, let the show go on, but prevent ANYONE from leaving while they try to solve the crime.  Amusing musical numbers and comedy routines go on while the investigation continues behind the scenes.  Enjoyable and the picture and color is very good.  There are subtitles available.  Highly recommended.
